params.index: The index of the specified transaction in the proposal's transaction list.

params.data: The concatenated data to be included in the proposed transactions.
params.dataLengths: The lengths of each transaction's data.
params.destinations: The destination addresses of the proposed transactions.
params.proposal: The proposal struct to be constructed.
params.values: The values of CELO to be sent in the proposed transactions.

devdoc.title: A library operating on Celo Governance proposals.

getTransaction(Proposals.Proposal storag.notice: Returns a specified transaction in a proposal.

updateVote(Proposals.Proposal storage,ui.notice: Adds or changes a vote on a proposal.
